level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-169
level.text: Law 19-169, the "People First Respectful Language Modernization Amendment Act of 2012," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-189. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Mar. 6, 2012, and Apr. 17, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 15, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-361 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-169 became effective on Sept. 26, 2012.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Section 35 of D.C. Law 19-169 provided that no provision of the act shall impair any right or obligation existing under law.
